articles.author: Diana Olick
articles.title: How this French building behemoth wants to solve the U.S. housing dilemma - CNBC
articles.description: Saint-Gobain is focusing on speed and affordability in construction through materials, assembly and other tools, according to North America CEO Mark Rayfield.

articles.author: Lena H. Sun
articles.title: AMA joins effort to launch vaccine science review amid CDC turmoil - The Washington Post
articles.description: The American Medical Association and a partner group are taking on a new role in reviewing vaccine safety and effectiveness as the CDC’s review process faces criticism.
articles.content: The American Medical Association and a leading public health research group focused on vaccines are teaming up to create a system to review vaccine safety and effectiveness, mirroring a role long pla… [+53 chars]
